thread.section_title: Gardner-White Furniture Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Gardner-White Furniture | www.gardner-white.com | 31 of 227
thread.title: Mike Smith
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Mike Smith

author: Mike Smith
title: Mike Smith
text:
Sales people were attentive, patient, and helpful, though didn't inform us of the sales price listed in their ad.
Delivery was prompt with good timeline updates though calls and emails. Delivery staff set up and placed furniture quickly.
After delivery, I noticed one of the arms on our couch was broken and the other had a scratch on the top of it. I called the delivery department who were helpful in replacing the section with broken arm.
Customer service was good; condition of furniture upon delivery was below expectation.
